description: Fran?ois Sagat returns for a solo interlude. Most of you probablyknow that Fran?ois is the top selling model in the US right now--hisbeautiful body has helped make Hard as Wood, Arabesque, andManifesto the top selling movies Raging Stallion has ever produced!We have filmed him doing solos before, but so many of you wrote usasking for more we decided to film him one more time. The behindthe-scenes story is this: one day he dropped by the studio and told ushe was horny as hell and wanted to shoot a spur-of-the-moment soloscene. Fran?ois likes to jerk off every day, but he decided to comedown and do it for us! We scrambled and got our camera crewtogether and Taurus took them to the wood shop and filmed thisscene. All because Fran?ois was horny and wanted to jerk off for hisfans. You gotta love a guy like that!
title: Tough As Nails, Scene #05
